release_notes.en-US: v Bugfix: After switching to a spell checker dictionary without a country code in it (e.g. "ca" or "fr") the QLS defaulted the selected locale back to the "main" country of that locale (e.g. "ca-AD" or "fr-FR") regardless of what the user had selected (e.g. "ca-ES" or "fr-CA").

release_notes.en-US:
v Try to do a softer match on unexpectedly named dictionaries. Previously I only exactly matched e.g. fr or fr-FR on the dictionary's file name which made it impossible to switch to "fr-FR-classique,reforme1990.dic", now it will try to find that fr/fr-FR in the name.
v Bugfix: The backup mechanism for the accept languages setting was broken.

release_notes.en-US:
v Added 2 links to the options window directing to the Thunderbird and Firefox dictionaries (AMO) and language packs (Mozilla ftp) sites.
v Implemented a pref observer for the accept_languages preference so that if a user manually changes it, the QLS backup pref for it can also be updated.
v Tested on Firefox 3.6b5 and Thunderbird 3.0 final.
v Enclosed loose JavaScript variables as per AMO policy.
v Bugfix: The statusbar tooltip in Thunderbird showed weird text.

release_notes.en-US:
v Change locales for upper/lower Sorbian to hsb-DE and dsb-DE.
v Added eo-EO, dsb-DE and hsb-DE translations.
v Tested on Firefox 3.5 final.

v Added switch back to previously selected locale shortcut, CTRL + SHIFT + Q
v Split up sr-SP into sr-RS (Serbian) and sr-ME (Montenegrin)
v Added nn-NO and sr-RS translations.

v Don't switch the locale in Thunderbird when auto switching to a not selected locale (e.g. via the TLD switch)
v Tested compatibility with Sunbird 0.9
v Bugfix, special gmail fix caused problems in Thunderbird (no gBrowser...)
v I forgot to remove the incomplete ja-JP translation from the chrome.manifest, resulting in an error on all ja-JP Firefox's.
v Tested on Firefox 3.1 Beta2
v Removed the incomplete Japanese translation, updated version will follow asap.

v Added back the setting to disable accept language header (about:config pref only because of translation...)
v Added Sri Lankan Tamil (ta-LK) as one of the default locales.
v Added mk-MK translation.

v Bugfix: Localization problem in the "no prefwindow" version (Seamonkey and friends) of the settings window caused errors.
v Bugfix: bug on babelzilla caused some translations to show empty dtd entities.
v Bugfix: Flags still did not always display correctly in Firefox 3

v Changed Firefox max version to 3.0.*
v Bugfix: Problem with the flag icons not displaying in Firefox 3
v Bugfix: Error when not using the toolbar caused the QLS not to work anymore.

v Brought back a separate setting for the accept language header switching (about:config only, set switch_accept_languages to false)
v Bugfix: After removing (unchecking) locales in the settings you had to restart Firefox before the toolbar/statusbar menus where updated.
v Bugfix: issue in the Hungarian (hu-HU) translation fixed.
v Bugfix: Made the statusbar icon + text persistent so you will no longer see the default icon just after startup.
v Tested on Firefox 3b5
